oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Certain spots, where the jackal, or the hyena, has been, avoided by Bushmen, for fear of skin disease. By /han=kasso (L VIII.29. 8584 rev.-8587 rev.). 1) This story is found in Book VIII-30.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Avoiding where the jackal or the hyena have passed water
